description:
Hoping that she could save this poor student who seemed to be trying his best, she gave him private lessons and as much help as she could.
Little did she know the "private lessons" would turn to be a little more than she bargained for.
Source: hanime.tv

titles.title: Pure and Innocent Female Teacher: Risako - The Disgrace of a Tricked Naivete
Risako Kashima, l’enseignante candide par excellence
無垢女教師・理沙子~誑かされたウブな恥辱♥~
